__e: All I'm saying is, why not just sink the damn boat?
The Russians want us to sink her. We might have to do that.
It is unsinkable. God Himself could not sink this ship--
Most of my people would sell their souls to slow life down.
Find something to lower it into the water.
We would have to slow down once within transporter range, giving the Kazon ample time to open fire.
So I said, "Hey, Mario, you gotta slow down. I think there's some horses coming up. " There weren't horses coming up, but anything to get this thing slowed down.
He didn't even attempt to slow down when he saw us.
Hopefully we can all build enough trust here so that we'll all lower our weapons, okay?
Let's lower the heat, lower the guns.
They really want you to put down your guns.
It appears we be not even worth the time it'd take to sink us.
we cannot afford to let them take us down.
He already knows more than enough to sink us.
Carl, could you quietly quiet down for a second, and please tell me what is going on, quietly? Okay? In a quiet voice.
To begin with, I think you should lower your voice.
And maybe you might think about lowering your voice... so maybe Lucy can hear you. Go, Sam.
